original_text: He engraved cherubim, lions and palm trees on the surfaces of the supports and on the panels, in every available space, with wreaths all around.
korean_text: 버팀대 판과 옆판에는 각각 빈 곳을 따라 그룹들과 사자와 종려나무를 아로새겼고 또 그 둘레에 화환 모양이 있더라

sentences.original_text: He engraved cherubim, lions and palm trees
on the surfaces of the supports and on the panels
